attributes.action:
Remove SUDAN from the red list for travel

!
attributes.additional_details: help families to get back to uk so kids join schools with no delays
attributes.background: Remove Sudan from the red list. Thousands of people are stuck in Sudan! Families are struggling financially and don’t have enough to come with No direct flights are being run! Help us come home

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Put Sudan on the amber list: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/591427
